discourse_list.title: DAI and cDAI getting high yields on Tornado Cash

content.content: Bringing the good news to all those who have been following Tornado Cash, the project supported by Vitalik himself and highly regarded across the industry: Tornado Cash now supports DAI and cDAI. Cherry on top: you get generously rewarded when doing so. Estimated APRs:  DAI: if depositing 100,000 DAI for one month, you get rewarded 4.04% (48.48% APR) cDAI: if depositing 5,000,000 ($105K worth) for one month, you get rewarded 4.65% (55.8% APR)  See the estimations in details on:    Tornado.cash community forum – 11 Apr 21    Anonymity Mining Spreadsheet I made a Google Sheets spreadsheet to calculate anonymity mining potential profitability:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lkTgiTcd3avSDRjzUUTL2R5EJM3QtcNHvxp_M1dqfvA/edit?usp=sharing  I might have made a mistake; if I did, please let me... Reading time: 2 mins 🕑 Likes: 25 ❤      Fees can be a bit heavy. See below:    Tornado.cash community forum – 30 Jan 21    Fee - how much does it cost to use? Couldn’t find info anywhere on the fee to use Tornado. How much does it cost me to run eth through it? Is it included in the gas? Reading time: 1 mins 🕑 Likes: 6 ❤      p.s. This is NOT a thread to discuss whether or not you like Tornado Cash

NotAnAnonAccount:  p.s. This is NOT a thread to discuss whether or not you like Tornado Cash    Ya–we Gringos, unfortunately we have to walk on eggshells–what can you do… Thanks for sharing Sir! And All the best!
Very good idea to shuffle it. Thanks for sharing
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
